dir-section.heading: Council of Ministers
dir-section.p: An interim administration took office on 28 January 2024 to hold office until legislative elections on 8 May. The Government principally comprises representatives of the Socijaldemokratski Sojuz na Makedonija (SDSM—Social Democratic Alliance of Macedonia), the Bashkimi Demokratik për Integrim (BDI—Democratic Union for Integration), the Vnatrešno-Makedonska Revolucionerna Organizacija-Demokratska Partija za Makedonsko Nacionalno Edinstvo (VMRO-DPMNE—Internal Macedonian Revolutionary Organization-Demo­cratic Party for Macedonian National Unity) and the Aleanca për Shqiptarët (ASh—Alliance for Albanians).
